verses.verse: Woe <WH480> is me <WH625>! for I am as when they have gathered the summer fruits <WH7019>, as the grapegleanings <WH5955> of the vintage <WH1210>: there is no cluster <WH811> to eat <WH398>: my soul <WH5315> desired <WH183> the firstripe fruit <WH1063>.

The good <WH2623> man is perished <WH6> out of the earth <WH776>: and there is none upright <WH3477> among men <WH120>: they all lie in wait <WH693> for blood <WH1818>; they hunt <WH6679> every man <WH376> his brother <WH251> with a net <WH2764>.

That they may do evil <WH7451> with both hands <WH3709> earnestly <WH3190>, the prince <WH8269> asks <WH7592>, and the judge <WH8199> asks for a reward <WH7966>; and the great <WH1419> man <WH1696>, he utters his mischievous <WH1942> desire <WH5315>: so they wrap it up <WH5686>.

The best <WH2896> of them is as a brier <WH2312>: the most upright <WH3477> is sharper than a thorn hedge <WH4534>: the day <WH3117> of your watchmen <WH6822> and your visitation <WH6486> comes <WH935>; now shall be their perplexity <WH3998>.
Trust <WH539> not in a friend <WH7453>, put not confidence <WH982> in a guide <WH441>: keep <WH8104> the doors <WH6607> of your mouth <WH6310> from her that lies <WH7901> in your bosom <WH2436>.

For the son <WH1121> dishonors <WH5034> the father <WH1>, the daughter <WH1323> rises up <WH6965> against her mother <WH517>, the daughter in law <WH3618> against her mother in law <WH2545>; a man <WH376>'s enemies <WH341> are the men <WH582> of his own house <WH1004>.
Therefore I will look <WH6822> unto the Lord <WH3068>; I will wait <WH3176> for the God <WH430> of my salvation <WH3468>: my God <WH430> will hear me <WH8085>.
Rejoice <WH8055> not against me <WH341>, O my enemy: when I fall <WH5307>, I shall arise <WH6965>; when I sit <WH3427> in darkness <WH2822>, the Lord <WH3068> shall be a light unto me <WH216>.

I will bear <WH5375> the indignation <WH2197> of the Lord <WH3068>, because I have sinned <WH2398> against him <WH7378>, until he plead my cause <WH7379>, and execute <WH6213> judgment <WH4941> for me <WH3318>: he will bring me forth to the light <WH216>, and I shall behold <WH7200> his righteousness <WH6666>.

Then she that is my enemy <WH341> shall see <WH7200> it <WH955>, and shame shall cover <WH3680> her which said <WH559> unto me <WH3068>, Where is the Lord your God <WH430>? my eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> her <WH4823>: now shall she be trodden down as the mire <WH2916> of the streets <WH2351>.
In the day <WH3117> that your walls <WH1447> are to be built <WH1129>, in that day <WH3117> shall the decree <WH2706> be far removed <WH7368>.

In that day <WH3117> also he shall come <WH935> even to you from Assyria <WH804>, and from the fortified <WH4693> cities <WH5892>, and from the fortress <WH4693> even to the river <WH5104>, and from sea <WH3220> to sea <WH3220>, and from mountain <WH2022> to mountain <WH2022>.
Nevertheless the land <WH776> shall be desolate <WH8077> because of them that live <WH3427> in it <WH6529>, for the fruit of their doings <WH4611>.

Feed <WH7462> your people <WH5971> with your rod <WH7626>, the flock <WH6629> of your heritage <WH5159>, which live <WH7931> solitarily <WH910> in the wood <WH3293>, in the midst <WH8432> of Carmel <WH3760>: let them feed <WH7462> in Bashan <WH1316> and Gilead <WH1568>, as in the days <WH3117> of old <WH5769>.
According to the days <WH3117> of your coming <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> will I show <WH7200> unto him marvelous things <WH6381>.

The nations <WH1471> shall see <WH7200> and be confounded <WH954> at all their might <WH1369>: they shall lay <WH7760> their hand <WH3027> upon their mouth <WH6310>, their ears <WH241> shall be deaf <WH2790>.

They shall lick <WH3897> the dust <WH6083> like a serpent <WH5175>, they shall move <WH7264> out of their holes <WH4526> like worms <WH2119> of the earth <WH776>: they shall be afraid <WH6342> of the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>, and shall fear because of you <WH3372>.

Who is a God <WH410> like unto you <WH5375>, that pardons iniquity <WH5771>, and passes by <WH5674> the transgression <WH6588> of the remnant <WH7611> of his heritage <WH5159>? he retains <WH2388> not his anger <WH639> for ever <WH5703>, because he delights <WH2654> in mercy <WH2617>.

He will turn again <WH7725>, he will have compassion <WH7355> upon us <WH3533>; he will subdue our iniquities <WH5771>; and you will cast <WH7993> all their sins <WH2403> into the depths <WH4688> of the sea <WH3220>.
You will perform <WH5414> the truth <WH571> to Jacob <WH3290>, and the mercy <WH2617> to Abraham <WH85>, which you have sworn <WH7650> unto our fathers <WH1> from the days <WH3117> of old <WH6924>.
